mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USER_ID, USER_PW, MG_AUTH, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_REGDATE, com_num) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, '1', #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, now(), 0 )

insert into Company (com_name, com_phone, com_email, com_address, com_category, com_ceo, com_businessRegistration, com_establishmentDate) values ( #{com_name}, #{com_phone}, #{com_email}, #{com_address}, #{com_category}, #{com_ceo}, #{com_businessRegistration}, #{com_establishmentDate} )
mapper.update: update user set com_num = (select com_num from company order by com_num desc limit 1) where user_id = #{user_id};
